issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Upgrade to latest version of sqlparser crate
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9466](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9466). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should upgrade to the latest version of the sqlparser crate so that we can support more complex queries, such as those used in TPCH.
